edu.mines.jtk.sgl.Point4

  • Packages that use Point4 
    Package Description
    edu.mines.jtk.sgl
    A scene graph for interactive 3-D graphics via OpenGL.

    • Uses of Point4 in edu.mines.jtk.sgl

      Methods in edu.mines.jtk.sgl that return Point4 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Point4 Point4.affine(double a, Point4 q)
      Returns an affine combination of this point p and the specified point q.
      Point4 Point4.homogenize()
      Returns the homogenized point equivalent to this point.
      Point4 Point4.homogenizeEquals()
      Homogenizes this point.
      Point4 Point4.minus(Vector3 v)
      Returns the point q = p-v, for this point p and the specified vector v.
      Point4 Point4.minusEquals(Vector3 v)
      Moves this point p by subtracting the specified vector v.
      Point4 Point4.plus(Vector3 v)
      Returns the point q = p+v, for this point p and the specified vector v.
      Point4 Point4.plusEquals(Vector3 v)
      Moves this point p by adding the specified vector v.
      Point4 Matrix44.times(Point4 p)
      Returns the product Mp of this matrix M and a point p.
      Point4 Matrix44.transposeTimes(Point4 p)
      Returns the product M'p of the transpose of this matrix M and a point p.
